definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: And any responsible leader should be standing up now and drawing that line.
sentences.chinese: 任何負責任的領袖，現在都應站出來，劃下這道界限。
